colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES PA 'DI NI MA GYUR NAM MKHA' MTHA' DANG MNYAM @007A *, ,PA'I SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB KYI DGE RTZA 'DZIN PA'I CHED DU BSNGO BA SMON LAM GYI PAR BYANG SMON TSIG 'DI NI BYANG PHYOGS RGYA SER GONG MA RGYAL PO'I LUNG GIS, CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN CHOS 'PHEL GLING GI CHOS RJE DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES RGYA MTSOS BSKUL NGOR BKA' 'GYUR MKHAN PO BLA MA BYANG CHUB ZLA BA DANG LDAN DON TSIG SHLOO KA GNYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
